amendment.description: An amendment to repeal section 213 of title II of Division C of the Continuing Appropriations, Agriculture, Legislative Branch, Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Extensions Act, 2026, and the amendments made by such section.
amendment.purpose: Amendment repeals section 213 of title II of Division C of the Continuing Appropriations, Agriculture, Legislative Branch, Military Construction and Veterans Affairs, and Extensions Act, 2026, and the amendments made by such section.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 427 - 0 (Roll no. 40).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 427 - 0 (Roll no. 40).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
